sage.renderer

Class RendererFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • sage.renderer.RendererFactory

  • public class RendererFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a Factory for creating renderer objects -- that is, objects which implement the IRenderer interface. Renderer implementation classes can register themselves as being available by invoking registerRenderer(String, Class). Client classes can obtain a Renderer implementation instance by invoking createRenderer(String), providing a String giving the particular Renderer's class name.
    Author:
    John Clevenger

      static IRenderer createRenderer(java.lang.String rendererClassName)
      A factory method (see the Factory Design Pattern) for creating instances of a particular AbstractRenderer (that is, an object which implements the IRenderer interface.
      static void registerRenderer(java.lang.String rendererName, java.lang.Class<?> rendererClassObject)
      Registers a renderer class (that is, a class implementing the IRenderer interface) and making the renderer available to clients.

      • registerRenderer

        public static void registerRenderer(java.lang.String rendererName,
                                    java.lang.Class<?> rendererClassObject)
        Registers a renderer class (that is, a class implementing the IRenderer interface) and making the renderer available to clients.
        Parameters:
        rendererName - - a String giving the Renderer class name
        rendererClassObject - - a Class object defining the Renderer implementation

      • createRenderer

        public static IRenderer createRenderer(java.lang.String rendererClassName)
        A factory method (see the Factory Design Pattern) for creating instances of a particular AbstractRenderer (that is, an object which implements the IRenderer interface.
        Parameters:
        rendererClassName - - a String giving the desired Renderer's class name (including any prefixes defining the Renderer's subpackage(s)
        Returns:
        - an instance of the specified Renderer class
